author: Simon Carswell
title: Simon Harris sorry for ‘awful boo-boo’ about 18 viruses before Covid-19
description: Minister apologises for mistake, saying he can be an ‘awful old idiot at times’
content:
Minister for Health Simon Harris has apologised for making what he called an awful boo-boo by incorrectly saying during a radio interview that there were 18 other coronaviruses before Covid-19.
Mr Harris made the error when explaining during an interview on … [+2666 chars]
